H0.text: Stalactites grow down from the top of cave. What grows up from the floor of a cave. Speleothem

H1.text: Stalactites grow down from the top of cave. What grows up from the floor of a cave. Dripstone

H2.text: Stalactites grow down from the top of cave. What grows up from the floor of a cave. Flowstone

H3.text: Stalactites grow down from the top of cave. What grows up from the floor of a cave. Stalagmite

A4.text: Stalagmite is a type of rock formation that rises from the floor of a cave due to the accumulation of material deposited on the floor from ceiling drippings.
